column5: So boy's weekend at the cottage last weekend.   The boy's wanted to go Walleye fishing in the nice cozy boat, and I well, have a lot of money invested in musky over the last few years - I'm going musky fishing, "Who's coming with me?"......  (Insert cricket sounds)    .  So no one was in my boat for this trip except me and my cradle (FisherPete Styles).  Trolled around open water noticing tons of musky boat hitting the shore lines/points hard and all the bait-fisherman were out in 30 FOW.  Marked all kinds of open water fish in the middle of nowhere (until my battery died on me). A little after 10 am my rod screams, bent like the Uglystik commercial.  "Dang rocks" I say, figuring a ran shallow with my unit being dead.  Shut the motor off to remove my snag, pull the rod out of the holder then I feel the headshake and run.  Whoo!  After reeling in 120' of line and two awesome jumps close to the boat she's in the cradle.  46" fish in a 48" cradle.
Way to go!!!  Very nice reward for going it alone
Nice fish, congrats.  It gets the heart pumping extra hard when you're solo eh ?
Congrats on your PB. Know the feelin and it feels great!!!
Heart pumping... more of a pant soiling, when I got my first look as she submarine'd up towards the surface  . "What do I do now?"  ...Any one, Why is my pic so small?
The picture might be small but the video works. Nice fish, gives me some hope for some day getting out there
There you go Muskybugged...pic's all better now.   Nice fish, congrats to you!
Great report!!!  You did good landing that Ski solo like that!!!  Good job on the self timer pic too!!!
Congrats on your PB muskybugged She's a real beauty Good job on the release!!! Thanks for sharing Leechman

Yes but I lost the other 2 Musky's that were on the other 2 hooks of the lure at boat side.  If I had someone with me I could have landed all 3 at once!!!  I had this little guy two weekends before as practice landing them solo and figured out the timer thing..... look familiar!    Thanks for the kind comments y'all!
LOL... Fisherpete style... we should make a song, "Just me'n'my cradle, all full of esox, set that self timer, cuz solo fishing rocks!" By the way, very nice fish!
Genetics.  You can by all kinds of liquids and pills nowadays to help with that (so I hear   )  Congrats on a nice looking fish
good for you on the pb! Bet those walleye guys wish they had joined you!
Congrats on the PB musky! Landing a fish of that size solo is a daunting task, but you managed to do so! Great story, thanks for sharing!
